NAME: Pankaj Bansal
ABOUT:
Pankaj is a seasoned software engineering professional with over 21 years of experience in designing, developing and delivering solutions for enterprise products and consumer applications, in individual and leadership roles. Products that Pankaj has worked on range from Cloud Stack, Analytics Library, IVR Systems to NIC Drivers, Windows OS to Cisco switches, Optical Transport OADMs to IP Load Balancer and desktop applications and web applications to mobile applications. Pankaj has experience in many technologies ranging from communication protocols, data networking, consumer applications, mobile applications, embedded system applications. In different organizations Pankaj has contributed as an Individual, Tech Lead, Team Lead and is currently managing a team at Adobe that delivers libraries for Cloud Support to all Adobe products. Previously, Pankaj was leading the Engineering team at KarmaCircles in the capacity of Chief Technical Officer. At KarmaCircles, Pankaj was handling Product Engineering, Dev Ops, Talent Acquisition and Retention, Training, Costing and Vendor Management, apart from being hands-on on the product. Prior to that, Pankaj CoFounded another startup and successfully executed a client project. Pankaj also advises a few other startups in technology.

Pankaj's Key Skills and Expertise include: Problem Analysis and Solving, Logic, Solution Architecture, System Analysis and Design, Technical Management, People Management and Talent Management.
